actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 314 of title 38, United States Code, to fix the rates of disability compensation for veterans rated 10 through 90 percent disabled in the proportion which the degree of disability bears to the rate applicable for a total rating.

summary.text: Raises and fixes the rates of disability compensation for veterans rated 10 through 90 percent disabled in the proportion which the degree of disability bears to the rate applicable for a total rating.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 314 of title 38, United States Code, to fix the rates of disability compensation for veterans rated 10 through 90 percent disabled in the proportion which the degree of disability bears to the rate applicable for a total rating.
